body.p: These questions are intended to ensure a depthful understanding of Gentoo as a whole and specific development situations that you will likely encounter during your time as a Gentoo developer. It's perfectly acceptable to ask your mentor or other knowledgable individuals for assistance. When completed, answers should be mailed to recruiters along with other items mentioned on http://www.gentoo.org/proj/en/devrel/recruiters/index.xml.

Developers who will have commit access to the Portage tree and/or will be performing ebuild development or maintainance tasks should take the ebuild quiz. Once the mentoring period is completed (or during the mentoring period, at the developer's option) the developer must also submit the end of mentoring quiz.
Developers who will be strictly working on infrastructure, GLSAs, or other non-ebuild areas of the project and will not have commit access to the Portage tree should take the staff quiz.
Setting up and accessing your dev email: http://www.gentoo.org/proj/en/infrastructure/dev-email.xml
